lines.name: Progenesis

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% reduced Charges per use
(1-34)% reduced Duration
(2-35)% increased Duration
When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead

lines.flavourText:
They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

lines.name: Oriath's End

explicitModifiers.text: (20-40)% increased Charge Recovery
Enemies you Kill during Effect have a (20-30)% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Damage of a Random Element

lines.flavourText:
Ennui prevailed, until inspiration sparked
a mote of flame, kindled by fury
and all in his path were obliterated.

lines.name: Progenesis

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% reduced Charges per use
(1-35)% reduced Duration
(1-35)% increased Duration

They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

explicitModifiers.text: (20-40)% increased Charge Recovery
Enemies you Kill during Effect have a (20-30)% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Damage of a Random Element

lines.flavourText:
Ennui prevailed, until inspiration sparked
a mote of flame, kindled by fury

lines.name: Bottled Faith

explicitModifiers.text: (15-30)% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies (7-10)% increased Damage taken to Enemies
(101-150)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect

lines.flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

lines.name: Dying Sun

explicitModifiers.text: (125-150)% increased Charges per use
(40-60)% less Duration
(10-20)% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect

lines.flavourText:
All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

lines.name: Starlight Chalice

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Charge Recovery
Inflict Fire, Cold and Lightning Exposure on nearby Enemies when used
(20-30)% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments you inflict during Effect

lines.flavourText:
Uhtred and his priests drank of the skies
to empower runes... and themselves.

lines.name: Olroth's Resolve

explicitModifiers.text: (40-50)% increased Charges per use
Ward does not Break during Effect
70% less Ward during Effect

lines.flavourText:
Olroth the Gallant,
tireless and true,
he fights for me,
he fights for you!

lines.name: Bottled Faith

explicitModifiers.text: (15-30)% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies (7-10)% increased Damage taken to Enemies
(100-150)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect

lines.flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

lines.name: Soul Ripper

explicitModifiers.text: +(-40-90) to Maximum Charges
Loses all Charges when you enter a new area
Consumes Maximum Charges to use
Gain Vaal Souls equal to Charges Consumed when used

lines.flavourText:
"What care have I for their pain? They're already dead."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

lines.name: Taste of Hate

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect

lines.flavourText:
A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

lines.name: Sin's Rebirth

implicitModifiers.text: Creates a Smoke Cloud on Use

explicitModifiers.text:
Grants Immunity to Ignite for 4 seconds if used while Ignited
Removes all Burning when used
Unholy Might during Effect

lines.flavourText:
And from the ashes he rose, like a black cloud.
The Sin of one became the Sin of many.

lines.name: Dying Sun

explicitModifiers.text: (125-150)% increased Charges per use
(40-60)% less Duration
(10-20)% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect

lines.flavourText:
All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

lines.name: Replica Sorrow of the Divine

explicitModifiers.text: Life Recovery from Flasks also applies to Energy Shield during Effect
(25-50)% increased Duration
Eldritch Battery during Effect

lines.flavourText:
"Success! Prototype #54 has tapped into that sliver of divinity that exists within.
Faith fuels the flesh, and the flesh fuels the fire..."

lines.name: Elixir of the Unbroken Circle

explicitModifiers.text: (20-40)% increased Duration

Recover 4% of Life per Endurance Charge on use
Lose all Endurance Charges on use
Gain 1 Endurance Charge per Second during Effect

lines.flavourText:
Nothing endures. All things end.
Then, they begin again.

lines.name: Replica Rumi's Concoction

explicitModifiers.text: 90% reduced Duration
Gain 1 Endurance Charge on use
Petrified during Effect
+(35-50)% Chance to Block Attack Damage during Effect
+(20-30)% Chance to Block Spell Damage during Effect

lines.flavourText:
"The most terrifying split second of my life." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Cinderswallow Urn

explicitModifiers.text: +90 to Maximum Charges
Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
(175-200)% increased Charges per use
(20-25)% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
(20-30)% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
50% Chance to Avoid being Stunned during Effect
15% of Damage Taken from Hits is Leeched as Life during Effect
(60-80)% reduced Reflected Damage taken during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take (7-10)% increased Damage
Recover (1-3)% of Mana when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
Recover (1-3)% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
Recover (1-3)% of Life when you Kill an Enemy during Effect

lines.flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

lines.name: Replica Lavianga's Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% increased Amount Recovered
50% reduced Recovery rate
(5-15)% increased Attack Speed during Effect
(5-15)% increased Cast Speed during Effect
10% increased Mana Cost of Skills during Effect

lines.flavourText: "An intriguing paradox."

lines.name: Vessel of Vinktar

explicitModifiers.text: (125-150)% increased Charges per use
Shocks nearby Enemies during Effect, causing 10% increased Damage taken
You are Shocked during Effect, causing 50% increased Damage taken
Adds (10-15) to (55-65) Lightning Damage to Spells during Effect
Adds (10-15) to (55-65) Lightning Damage to Attacks during Effect
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning during Effect
Damage Penetrates 6% Lightning Resistance during Effect
(25-40)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict during Effect
Shocks you inflict during Effect spread to other Enemies in a radius of 20
20% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life during Effect

lines.flavourText: The great city of storms, washed away by Vinktar's thirst for power.

lines.name: Rumi's Concoction

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage during Effect
+(4-6)% Chance to Block Spell Damage during Effect

lines.flavourText:
"Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world.
Today I am wise, so I am changing myself."
-Rumi of the Vaal

lines.name: Divination Distillate

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
(20-30)% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
25% increased Light Radius during Effect
+50% to Elemental Resistances during Effect

lines.flavourText:
Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

lines.name: Atziri's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (5-8)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain (5-8)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect

lines.flavourText:
"Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty." 
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Coruscating Elixir

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Duration
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield during effect

Removes all but one Life on use
Removed life is Regenerated as Energy Shield over 2 seconds

lines.flavourText:
Let blood sear in your veins, 
Let the pain push outwards and turn away your enemy's blows.

lines.name: Lion's Roar

explicitModifiers.text: Knocks Back Enemies in an Area when you use a Flask
75% chance to cause Enemies to Flee on use
Adds Knockback to Melee Attacks during Effect
(7-10)% more Melee Physical Damage during effect

lines.flavourText:
A sprinkle of hunger, a spoonful of menace
and three generous cups of Might.

lines.name: Zerphi's Last Breath

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Charges per use
Grants Last Breath when you Use a Skill during Effect, for (450-600)% of Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
"Proof that if you devote yourself to a god of death,
you may be spared from its wrath."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 408

lines.name: Vorana's Preparation

explicitModifiers.text: (1-10)% increased Charges per use
(1-10)% reduced Charges per use
Debilitate nearby Enemies for 2 Seconds when Effect ends
Effect is removed when Ward Breaks
Culling Strike during Effect

lines.flavourText:
Vorana trained her mercenaries
thus: strike true and survive.

lines.name: Witchfire Brew

implicitModifiers.text: Creates a Smoke Cloud on Use

explicitModifiers.text: (1-10)% increased Charges per use
(1-10)% reduced Charges per use
Grants Level 21 Despair Curse Aura during Effect

lines.flavourText:
"Think of those that cursed us, judged us, 
and burned our sisters upon the pyre. 
Think of their names as you drink, 
and even their children will feel what we do to them today." 
-Vadinya, to her coven

lines.name: The Wise Oak

explicitModifiers.text: During Effect, 6% reduced Damage taken of each Element for which your Uncapped Elemental Resistance is lowest
During Effect, Damage Penetrates (5-8)% Resistance of each Element for which your Uncapped Elemental Resistance is highest

lines.flavourText:
The summer sun dries the soil and burns the leaves.
The autumn rain extinguishes the flames.
The spring bloom shades the wet earth.
Nature is an eternal tug of war.

lines.name: The Writhing Jar

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% reduced Charges per use
(65-75)% reduced Amount Recovered
Instant Recovery

2 Enemy Writhing Worms escape the Flask when used
Writhing Worms are destroyed when Hit

lines.flavourText:
To achieve godhood, they would cast off all that god has gifted us.
Mortality, compassion, even the sanctity of flesh.
 - High Templar Voll

lines.name: Blood of the Karui

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Life Recovered
(35-50)% reduced Recovery rate
Recover Full Life at the end of the Effect

lines.flavourText:
"Kaom fought and killed for his people.
Kaom bled for his people.
And so the people gave, the people bled,
So their King might go on."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Lavianga's Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% increased Amount Recovered
100% increased Recovery rate
Skills Cost no Mana during Effect

lines.flavourText:
"When the Ancestors fill your cup,
It is only good manners to drink your fill."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Sorrow of the Divine

explicitModifiers.text: Life Recovery from Flasks also applies to Energy Shield during Effect
(25-50)% increased Duration
Zealot's Oath during Effect

lines.flavourText:
As man sins,
God weeps.

lines.name: Doedre's Elixir

explicitModifiers.text: (250-300)% increased Charges per use
Removes 80% of your maximum Energy Shield on use
You take 50% of your maximum Life as Chaos Damage on use
Gain 1 Endurance Charge on use
Gain (2-3) Endurance Charges on use
Gain 1 Frenzy Charge on use
Gain (2-3) Frenzy Charges on use
Gain (2-3) Power Charges on use
Gain 1 Power Charge on use

lines.flavourText:
Doedre Darktongue knew the Way of the Thaumaturge.
In order to receive, one must give... without hesitation.

lines.name: Forbidden Taste

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (75-100)% of Life on use
25% of Maximum Life taken as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Your reach exceeds your grasp.

lines.name: Kiara's Determination

explicitModifiers.text: (60-80)% reduced Duration
Immunity to Freeze, Chill, Curses and Stuns during Effect

lines.flavourText:
Travelers of the deep wood speak of a witch
whose ale provides a different kind
of liquid courage.

lines.name: Rotgut

explicitModifiers.text: 50% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
(30-50)% increased Duration
Consumes Frenzy Charges on use
Gain Onslaught for 3 seconds per Frenzy Charge on use

lines.flavourText: Rancid, rotten, and wicked are those that dare to taste my serum.

lines.name: The Overflowing Chalice

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% increased Charge Recovery
(50-100)% increased Charges gained by Other Flasks during Effect
Gains no Charges during Effect of any Overflowing Chalice Flask

lines.flavourText: Empty cup, full of promise.

lines.name: Coralito's Signature

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Poison on Hit during Effect
Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage during Effect
+(20-30)% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Poison from Critical Strikes during Effect
Take 250 Chaos Damage per Second during Effect

lines.flavourText:
"What cruelty it is, that to be judged a success,
such great work must go uncredited." 
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Soul Catcher

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot gain Mana during effect
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance with Vaal Skills during effect
(60-80)% increased Damage with Vaal Skills during effect
Vaal Skills used during effect have 10% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration

lines.flavourText:
Freedom is for the privileged, even in death.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of the Ghost}
